title: Global AI Ethics Standards in Works, Will be Adopted Once Finalised: Consumer Affairs Secretary
description: With artificial intelligence increasingly permeating daily life, global standard-setting bodies are deliberating on frameworks for its ethical
content: "Indian experts are in the international standards-setting committees. Once the global standards are framed, they will be adopted by the countries, including India," Khare told PTI on the sidelines of a PHDCCI conference on harnessing AI to combat fr... [1462 chars]

title: Fundraising frenzy, AI buzz fuel Chinese tech rally
description: Years of heavy investing by Baidu, Alibaba and Tencent in artificial intelligence and advanced chips are bearing fruit.
content:
AI and internet giant Baidu led the charge in Hong Kong, sitting 16% higher—its biggest gain in over three years. E-commerce juggernauts climbed too, with Alibaba Group up 5.3%, Meituan rising 4.9% and JD.com trading 5.15% higher.
The Hang Seng Tech ... [3593 chars]

title: Google Gemini AI: From photos with Taylor Swift, SRK, Karan Aujla to Virat Kohli & Messi, 10 prompts to reimagine pics with celebrities
description: Artificial intelligence now offers new ways to transform photos. Google Gemini's image model allows users to reimagine their selfies. The tool uses vivid prompts to change images. Users can blend their photos with celebrities like Shah Rukh Khan or Taylor Swift. The article provides ten free Gemini prompts. These prompts help users create unique celebrity-inspired images.

title: AI bot in the classroom: Time to fight off this attack on education
description: Such lifeless ideas seldom die even after being proven wrong. This time, the idea of educating children through artificial intelligence (AI) is the big threat. It’s an idea we must fight off—as it’s amply clear that bots can never replace teachers.
content:
Zombie ideas are a sub-category of undead ideas—they can still motivate action despite being harmful and wrong. Education has been under attack from a few zombie ideas, but none has the resilience of ‘technology can teach.’
First, let us be clear abo... [4552 chars]

title: South Australian politician and ‘watchdog’ Frank Pangallo caught using unverified AI generated information to prove conspiracy
description: He has admitted to using artificial intelligence to craft his submissions to parliament.
content:
A politician is under fire after admitting to using artificial intelligence to generate academic sources he then submitted to a parliamentary inquiry.
However, some of the sources did not exist.

title: Taiwan GDP per capita lead over Korea attributed to TSMC, AI boom
description: Yeh Chun-hsien, head of the National Development Council (NDC), on Wednesday attributed Taiwan's forecast lead over South Korea in gross domestic product (GDP) per capita in 2025 to the success of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. (TSMC) and a boom in artificial intelligence applications, as per a report by Focus Taiwan.
